message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you an incredible opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a game-changer in its industry and has the potential to bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9000 for it. I think that's a fair price considering the value you mentioned it brings to the business.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $9000 is a bit lower than my initial asking price, but I'm willing to consider a compromise. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $11000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price considering the product's potential benefits to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $11000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value you mentioned it brings to the business.

I understand that $10500 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $10800. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price considering the product's potential benefits to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, $10800 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value you mentioned it brings to the business.
